column5: Took a run out in the "Tin" this morning as it looked like a good pickerel "chop" on the water...perfect for drift fishing...  Turns out it was a better rock bass "chop"...shallow...deep...didn't matter...  Like I told my neighbor...when I'm out there the only worry I got in the whole world is if some dumb fish gets itself caught on my hook...and if I don't put any bait on it...I don't even have that to worry about...yep...good mental therapy this fishing !
Glad you enjoyed your day Norm...  Maureen
Funny how rewarding fishing can be even when you aren't successful!
